From: 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: Mark Epstein 
Date: Thu, 24 Oct 2019 16:32:29 +0000 
No problem, and of course if she wants us instead we'll reach out. 
From 
Se t: Thursday. October 24. 2019 11:56
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: Mark Epstein 
Thanks. Good call — I had those guys reach out. 
From: 
Sent: Thursday, October 24, 2019 9:31 AM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: Mark Epstein 
I think it's possible she may be reaching out in connection with the death investigation—do you have a sense of what she 
wants? Happy to call her back in the first instance, just wanted to flag it in case you'd rather have the other team respond 
initially—whatever you prefer. 
From: 
Sent: Thursda October 24 2019 09:29 
To: 
Su ject: Mar Epstein 
I forgot to convey to you last week that Stacey Richman had left me a vm re her client Mark Epstein. She left me another 
vm this morning. Could you guys call her back? 
EFTA00015524
